languages.text: "Я также желаю почтить спасител{mf|я|ьницу} Райкада Минорис и уже отдал приказ о подготовке празднества в вашу честь. Мы отметим победу старинной традицией — триумфом. Вы, как положено {mf|герою|героине}, одержавш{mf|ему|ей} победу над врагами {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, проедете по улицам города в сопровождении почетного караула, с демонстрацией ликующим толпам ваших трофеев. Дайте мне знать, когда завершите дела в системе и будете готовы!" {n}Губернатор Медина просто пылает энтузиазмом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я также желаю почтить спасител{mf|я|ницу} Райкад Минорис и уже отдал приказ о подготовке празднества в вашу честь. Мы отметим победу старинной традицией — триумфом. Вы, как положено {mf|герою|героине}, одержавш{mf|ему|ей} победу над врагами {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, проедете по улицам города в сопровождении почетного караула, с демонстрацией ликующим толпам ваших трофеев. Дайте мне знать, когда завершите дела в системе и будете готовы!" {n}Губернатор Медина просто пылает энтузиазмом.{/n}

languages.text: "I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order for a celebration to be held in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я также желаю почтить спасител{mf|я|ьницу} Райкада Минорис и уже отдал приказ о подготовке празднества в вашу честь. Мы отметим победу старинной традицией — триумфом. Вы, как положено {mf|герою|героине}, одержавш{mf|ему|ей} победу над врагами {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, проедете по улицам города в сопровождении почетного караула, с демонстрацией ликующим толпам ваших трофеев. Дайте мне знать, когда завершите дела в системе и будете готовы!" {n}Губернатор Медина просто пылает энтузиазмом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I would also like to honour the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order to prepare a festivity in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom, the triumph. You will drive through the city streets with a guard of honour, as befits a hero who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know when you conclude your business in this system and are ready!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

"I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and I have already ordered to prepare a festive celebration in your honour. We will celebrate your victory with an ancient custom, the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know when you are ready once you've concluded your business in this system!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

Let me know when you are ready once you've concluded your business in this system!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

"I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and I have already a festive celebration to be held in your honour. We will celebrate your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

"I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and I have already a festive celebration to be held in your honour. We will celebrate your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich möchte auch {mf|dem Retter|der Retterin} von Rykad Minoris danken. Ich habe bereits ein Fest zu Euren Ehren angeordnet. Wir werden Euren Sieg mit einem alten Brauch feiern ... dem Triumph. Ihr werdet in Begleitung einer Ehrengarde durch die Straßen der Stadt fahren, wie es sich für {mf|einen Helden, der|eine Heldin, die} die Feinde des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} besiegt hat, geziemt. Den jubelnden Massen werden dabei Eure Trophäen präsentiert. Wenn Ihr Eure Angelegenheiten in diesem System geklärt habt und bereit für den Triumph seid, gebt mir Bescheid!" {n}Gouverneur Medineh ist Feuer und Flamme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order for a celebration to be held in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

Wir werden Euren Sieg mit einem alten Brauch feiern ... dem Triumph. Ihr werdet in Begleitung einer Ehrengarde durch die Straßen der Stadt fahren, wie es sich für {mf|einen Helden, der|eine Heldin, die} die Feinde des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} besiegt hat, geziemt. Den jubelnden Massen werden dabei Eure Trophäen präsentiert. Wenn Ihr Eure Angelegenheiten in diesem System geklärt habt und bereit für den Triumph seid, gebt mir Bescheid!" {n}Gouverneur Medineh ist Feuer und Flamme.{/n}

"Ich möchte auch {mf|dem Retter|der Retterin} von Rykad Minoris danken. Ich lasse bereits eine Feier zu Euren Ehren vorbereiten. Wir werden Euren Sieg mit einem uralten Brauch feiern, dem Triumph. Ihr werdet in Begleitung einer Ehrengarde durch die Straßen der Stadt fahren, wie es sich für {mf|einen Helden, der|eine Heldin, die} die Feinde des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} besiegt hat, geziemt. Den jubelnden Massen werden dabei Eure Trophäen präsentiert. Wenn Ihr Eure Angelegenheiten in diesem System geklärt habt und bereit für den Triumph seid, gebt mir Bescheid!" {n}Gouverneur Medineh ist Feuer und Flamme.{/n}

languages.text: « Je tiens également à saluer {mf|le sauveur|la sauveuse} de Rykad Minoris et j'ai d'ores et déjà organisé des festivités en votre honneur. Nous allons marquer votre victoire avec une ancienne coutume, le triomphe. Vous traverserez les rues de la cité en compagnie d'une garde d'honneur, comme il sied à {mf|un héros|une héroïne} qui a vaincu les ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, pendant que vos trophées seront montrés à la foule en liesse. Prévenez-moi quand vous serez {mf|prêt|prête}, une fois que vous aurez conclu vos affaires dans ce système ! » {n}Le gouverneur Medineh déborde littéralement d'enthousiasme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order for a celebration to be held in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je tiens également à saluer {mf|le sauveur|la sauveuse} de Rykad Minoris et j'ai d'ores et déjà organisé des festivités en votre honneur. Nous allons marquer votre victoire avec une ancienne coutume, le triomphe. Vous traverserez les rues de la cité en compagnie d'une garde d'honneur, comme il sied à {mf|un héros|une héroïne} qui a vaincu les ennemis de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, pendant que vos trophées seront montrés à la foule en liesse. Prévenez-moi quand vous serez {mf|prêt|prête}, une fois que vous aurez conclu vos affaires dans ce système ! » {n}Le gouverneur Medineh déborde littéralement d'enthousiasme.{/n}

languages.text: “我还想向小莱卡德的救世主致敬。我已经下令为您准备一场庆典，届时，我们将以被称为‘凯旋巡礼’的古老习俗来见证您的胜利。您，身为击败{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}之敌的英雄，会在仪仗队的陪同下，乘车穿过城市的街道，将您的战利品展示给欢庆的人群。等您在这个星系的事务办完之后，请立即通知我，我们一起来庆祝您的伟大胜利！”{n}梅迪涅总督热情满满地说道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order for a celebration to be held in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我还想向小莱卡德的救世主致敬。我已经下令为您准备一场庆典，届时，我们将以被称为‘凯旋巡礼’的古老习俗来见证您的胜利。您，身为击败{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}之敌的英雄，会在仪仗队的陪同下，乘车穿过城市的街道，将您的战利品展示给欢庆的人群。等您在这个星系的事务办完之后，请立即通知我，我们一起来庆祝您的伟大胜利！”{n}梅迪涅总督热情满满地说道。{/n}
“我还想向小莱卡德的救世主致敬。我已经下令为您准备一场节日庆典，届时，我们将以被称为‘凯旋巡礼’的古老习俗来庆祝您的胜利。您，身为击败{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}之敌的英雄，会在仪仗队的陪同下，乘车穿过城市的街道，将您的战利品展示给欢庆的人群。等您在这个星系的事务办完之后，请立即通知我，我们一起来庆祝您的伟大胜利！”{n}梅迪涅总督热情满满地说道。{/n}

languages.text: 「また、ライカド・ミノリスの救世主に敬意を表したい。すでにそのために祝い事を催すよう命じた。古い慣習に則って、あなたの勝利を凱旋で祝おう。あなたには儀仗兵を付き添わせて、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵を倒した英雄にふさわしく、街の通りを行進していただき、戦利品を喜ぶ大衆にお披露目しよう。この星系の用事が終わって、祝う準備が整ったら、私に知らせてください」{n}メディネ総督は前のめりで熱く語る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order for a celebration to be held in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「また、ライカド・ミノリスの救世主に敬意を表したい。すでにそのために祝い事を催すよう命じた。古い慣習に則って、あなたの勝利を凱旋で祝おう。あなたには儀仗兵を付き添わせて、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵を倒した英雄にふさわしく、街の通りを行進していただき、戦利品を喜ぶ大衆にお披露目しよう。この星系の用事が終わって、祝う準備が整ったら、私に知らせてください」{n}メディネ総督は前のめりで熱く語る。{/n}

「また、ライカド・ミノリスの救世主に敬意を表したい。すでにそのために祝い事を催すよう命じた。古い慣習に則って、あなたの勝利を凱旋で祝おう。あなたには儀仗兵を付き添わせて、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の敵を倒した英雄にふさわしく、街の通りを行進していただき、戦利品を喜ぶ大衆にお披露目しよう。この星系の用事が終わって、祝う準備が整ったら、私に知らせてください」{n}メディネ総督は前のめりで熱く語る。{/n}

languages.text: «Yo también quiero homenajear a{mf|l| la} salvador{mf||a} de Rykad Minoris y he ordenado que se celebre una fiesta en su honor. Honraremos la victoria con una antigua costumbre, el Triunfo. Recorrerá las calles de la ciudad en compañía de una guardia de honor, como corresponde a un{mf||a} {mf|héroe|heroína} que ha vencido a los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, mientras sus trofeos se exhiben ante la multitud. ¡Avíseme cuando haya terminado sus asuntos en el sistema y quiera empezar el triunfo!». {n}El gobernador Medineh arde de entusiasmo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order for a celebration to be held in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo también quiero homenajear a{mf|l| la} salvador{mf||a} de Rykad Minoris y he ordenado que se celebre una fiesta en su honor. Honraremos la victoria con una antigua costumbre, el Triunfo. Recorrerá las calles de la ciudad en compañía de una guardia de honor, como corresponde a un{mf||a} {mf|héroe|heroína} que ha vencido a los enemigos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, mientras sus trofeos se exhiben ante la multitud. ¡Avíseme cuando haya terminado sus asuntos en el sistema y quiera empezar el triunfo!». {n}El gobernador Medineh arde de entusiasmo.{/n}

languages.text: "Ayrıca Rykad Minoris'in kurtarıcısına da hürmetimi sunmak isterim. Şerefinize bir kutlama merasimi düzenlenmesini emrettim bile. Zaferinizi, kadim bir gelenek olan zafer alayıyla kutlayacağız. Siz, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} düşmanlarına boyun eğdiren bir kahramana yaraşır şekilde bir şeref kıtasıyla şehrin sokaklarında turlarken, kazandığınız ganimetler de coşkulu halka sergilenecek. Bu sistemdeki işiniz bittiğinde ve zafer alayına hazır olduğunuzda haber verin lütfen!" {n}Vali Medineh kelimenin tek anlamıyla coşkuyla dolup taşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I would also like to salute the saviour of Rykad Minoris and have already given the order for a celebration to be held in your honour. We will mark your victory with an ancient custom — the triumph. You will drive through the city streets accompanied by a guard of honour, as befits a {mf|hero|heroine} who has vanquished the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s enemies, while your trophies will be displayed to the jubilant crowds. Let me know once you have concluded your business in this system and are ready for the triumph to begin!" {n}Governor Medineh is positively ablaze with enthusiasm.{/n}

Siz, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} düşmanlarına boyun eğdiren bir kahramana yaraşır şekilde bir şeref kıtasıyla şehrin sokaklarında turlarken, kazandığınız ganimetler de coşkulu halka sergilenecek. Bu sistemdeki işiniz bittiğinde ve zafer alayına hazır olduğunuzda haber verin lütfen!" {n}Vali Medineh kelimenin tek anlamıyla coşkuyla dolup taşıyor.{/n}
